definition: surname Chen/Chen (c. 1045 - 479 BC), a Zhou dynasty state/Chen (557-589), one of the Southern Dynasties 南朝[Nan2 Chao2]
to lay out/to exhibit/to display/to narrate/to state/to explain/to tell/old/stale

sentences.english: Representation in the Senate is based on the principle of state equality.
sentences.chinese: 参议院的陈诉基于国家平等的原则。

sentences.english: As it turned out, his statement was false.
sentences.chinese: 他的陈诉最后被证明是假的。

sentences.english: The man who told me thellos refused to tell me hellos name.
sentences.chinese: 陈诉我这事的人不肯告知我他的名儿。

sentences.english: Here is the report of chemical composition inspection.
sentences.chinese: 这是化学成份检验陈诉。

sentences.english: He was very tired- as a consequence he didn't give the market report.
sentences.chinese: 他很是疲倦，所以没能作市场陈诉。

sentences.english: trivial tributes constitute the attribute of constituent's report.
sentences.chinese: 琐屑的颂文形成选平易近的陈诉的属性。

sentences.english: I told the counsellors that it was such a disgrace for this thing to happen on me.
sentences.chinese: 我向官方辅导员陈诉这件事情的发生真的是无地自容。

sentences.english: Haudio-videoe you seen the shortage clobjective from our company?
sentences.chinese: 您看过我公司的短重索赔陈诉了吗？

sentences.english: Now that report is highly anticipated.
sentences.chinese: 现在陈诉报道的含金量非常高。

sentences.english: He prefers making speeches after careful preparation.
sentences.chinese: 他甘愿在经心筹备后去做陈诉。
正在陈诉你的航班信息。

definition: to defend oneself/to rebut a charge
to repeat (one's own words or sb else's)/(in the classroom) to paraphrase what one has learned
variant of 複述|复述[fu4 shu4]
to shed tears while recounting sth/speaking in a tearful voice
present the facts and reason things out
pinyin: bai3 shi4 shi2 jiang3 dao4 li3

definition: to accuse/to denounce/to make a complaint against/denunciation
to counter accusations/to protest/to remonstrate/to retort/to plead/to demur/a plea (of not guilty)/a defense (against an allegation)/to enter a plea to a charge (in a law court)
